definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: Perhaps one image still seduces Maradona's compatriots.
sentences.chinese: 也許有一個鏡頭至今還吸引着馬拉多納的同胞。

sentences.english: Maradona also praised Javier Zanetti for his reaction to losing the captaincy .
sentences.chinese: 馬拉多納同樣表揚了扎內蒂失去隊長袖標之後的反應。

sentences.english: Argentina's coach Diego Maradona is perplexed in Cape Town.
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷教練迪亞哥馬拉多納在開普敦賽場上充滿無奈。

sentences.english: Replays left no doubt that it was the hand of Maradona that scored the goal.
sentences.chinese: 比賽錄像清晰無疑地顯示了馬拉多納是手球得分的。

sentences.english: In the 51st minute, Maradona turned villain in the eyes of purists and moralists everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 第51分鐘，馬拉多納成爲了一些衛道士眼中的魔鬼。

sentences.english: Maradona atoned by inspiring Argentina to win the next World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 馬拉多納通過激勵阿根廷獲得世界盃冠軍獲得了救贖。

sentences.english: But Maradona has continued to say he wants complete control over all footballing decisions.
sentences.chinese: 但是馬拉多納一直說他想完全控制球隊所有的決策。

sentences.english: Maradona has been playing on drugs for most of his career.
sentences.chinese: 馬拉多納足球生涯中大半時間與毒品有染。

sentences.english: The midfielder laid the ball off for Maradona.
sentences.chinese: 中場隊員把球傳給馬拉多納射門。

sentences.english: I saw that he's mature and full of will, " Maradona said.
sentences.chinese: 我能看到他的成熟和鬥志昂揚，”馬拉多納說。

sentences.english: Maradona, meanwhile, has issues with pretty much everyone in the world.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，馬拉多納幾乎跟世界上每一個人都有問題。

sentences.english: They have not invented a drug that can make you play like Maradona.
sentences.chinese: 還沒有人能發明一種能像馬拉多納那樣踢球的藥物。

sentences.english: L' welcome to the Maradona provoked jealousies to Milanello?
sentences.chinese: 小羅受到了馬拉多納式的歡迎？

sentences.english: What? A:The wonderful passing Meladona did.
sentences.chinese: 什麼？馬拉多納的那記傳球太棒了。

sentences.english: Bilardo was employed as technical director to provide support for Maradona, only for the coach to demand he spend games in the stands "with a suit and tie on".
sentences.chinese: 比拉爾多被聘爲技術總監，爲馬拉多納提供支持。

sentences.english: I don't know how Maradona wants to play.
sentences.chinese: 我也搞不懂，馬拉多納這樣做有什麼道理。
